title: Shops, except convenience shopping, may be permitted up to second floor with separate access unless otherwise specified, subject to road having width of 18 m or more, except as stated in condition no 17 of Table B
clause_text: Shops, except convenience shopping, may be permitted up to second floor with separate access unless otherwise specified, subject to road having width of 18 m or more, except as stated in condition no 17 of Table B.
